scripts.rollup:browser: grunt get-version && npm run prebuild:browser && rollup --config rollup.config-browser.js && npm run clean
scripts.rollup:browser-es5: grunt get-version && npm run prebuild:browser-es5 && rollup --config rollup.config-browser-es5.js && grunt concat:es5polyfills && npm run clean
scripts.rollup:node: grunt get-version && npm run prebuild:node && rollup --config rollup.config-node.js && npm run clean
scripts.rollup:react-native: grunt get-version && npm run prebuild:react-native && rollup --config rollup.config-react-native.js && npm run clean
scripts.build: npm run rollup:browser --omit=dev && npm run rollup:browser-es5 --omit=dev && npm run rollup:node --omit=dev && npm run rollup:react-native --omit=dev
scripts.test: npm run test:browser && npm run test:browser-es5 &&  npm run test:node
